snippet: The Cube, a temporary restaurant conceived by the Swedish appliance brand Electrolux, is open in Milan. This four-month project allows Michelin-starred chefs assume two-week residencies to experiment with locally sourced ingredients and regional...
abstract: The Cube, a temporary restaurant conceived by the Swedish appliance brand Electrolux, is open in Milan. This four-month project allows Michelin-starred chefs assume two-week residencies to experiment with locally sourced ingredients and regional cuisines. Seating is limited to 18.

headline.main: A Temporary Eco-Minded Restaurant Pops Up in Milan
